author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Rename DragHandler to DragSource and DropHandler to DropTarget to prepare for clipboard and drag/drop API updates.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: API cleanup; drag/drop currently broken - will be fixed in next checkin.

author: tvolkert
msg: Changed DragDropManager to supply the most descriptive alternative to the FileInputList data flavor for native drop operations instead of just looking for the string data flavor

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add support for native drop operations (drag not yet supported).

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Split DropHandler#drop() into two methods so we can integrate with native drag/drop. Move Mouse data into an instance variable in ApplicationContext so callers see the correct coordinates for the current application context.
